rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Vestibule
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area incorporating a foyer and small sitting area.

rooms.name: Living Room (Triplex Living Space)
rooms.description: An expansive living area divided into three sections to accommodate the triplex lifestyle. Vastu compliant orientation with north and east exposure for positive energy.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A dining room adjacent to the living area for communal family meals.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed with ample counter space and storage. Placed in the east for auspicious cooking environment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, located on the west side to balance privacy and light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom for family members or guest use.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room designed with Vastu principles in mind for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Family Bedroom
rooms.description: Multi-use family bedroom to foster a connected living environment.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Dedicated study space ensuring sufficient light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Primary en-suite bathroom for the master bedroom and additional bath facilities adjoining family areas.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligning with Vastu for a welcoming energy.

rooms.name: Private Gymnasium
rooms.description: A dedicated private gym space with ample room for equipment and personal training. Positioned in the north-east quadrant for optimal energy and health benefits.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A home office setup ensuring privacy and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom on the upper floor to accommodate extended visits.

rooms.name: Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A secondary master suite with attached bathroom for flexibility in sleeping arrangements.

openings.description: A modern glass door for privacy and natural light.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A spacious rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and a relaxing outdoor space. Equipped with seating areas and pergolas.

openings.description: A dedicated staircase ensuring safe and comfortable access.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool
rooms.description: An elegantly designed swimming pool area integrated with landscaping, positioned on the west side of the plot to maintain privacy and adhere to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A paved deck surrounding the swimming pool for safety and leisure.
